title: Race Face adds steel 1x Cinch chainring for Shimano 12 speed drivetrains
content:
Narrow-wide chainrings have forever changed the 1x drivetrain. Being able to ride with confidence that your chain won’t drop without a front derailleur is critical to the success of 1x.
